themes: Need for qualified and knowledgeable panelists
Recognition of artistic merit not reflected in funding
key_phrases: Merit and history seem to be unimportant
we must have better trained and knowledgeable panelists
more financial support for the limited number of venues we still have in the city
The Austin Critics Awards recently nominated six plays for outstanding production. Three of the six were performed at our venue. And yet, we received only the minimum amount of funding
